news.title: Cyclone Preparedness and Coastal Protection Measures
news.content: Orissa High Court mandates comprehensive cyclone preparedness and coastal protection measures, emphasizing early warning systems and community resilience in coastal Odisha.

news.title: Temple Heritage Conservation and Tourism Balance
news.content: The court establishes guidelines for balancing temple heritage conservation with religious tourism, ensuring structural integrity and spiritual significance of ancient temples.

news.title: Tribal Land Rights and Mining Operations Framework
news.content: Orissa High Court establishes framework for protecting tribal land rights while regulating mining operations, ensuring community consent and environmental compliance.
